title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 508.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 508.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part promulgates the rules of the Civil Defense

Commission pursuant to which local social services officials shall furnish
defense emergency aid to persons who are in need because of
attack. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
508.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
